title: Caitlin Cleans Her Closet: A Fun Phonics Series
description: Caitlin the caterpillar has a very cluttered closet. But instead of cleaning it, Caitlin continues to cram in clothes, crayons, and even a canoe! Uh-oh, will Caitlin's closet finally collapse? Help Caitlin learn the importance of keeping her room tidy. Help your child get a head-start and build essential English skills through this educational and engaging book. By introducing one phonic sound per book, this series teaches your child to correctly pronounce and read words in a fun and easy way. Be prepared to see your child's reading fluency, spelling ability and confidence skyrocket!
author: Little Geniuses
